availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Perry P. Strait (Simpson County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Simpson County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Resident in Allen County, Kentucky, in 1850. Merchant in Simpson County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Allen County, p. 187B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 113.
Find A Grave, "Perry P. Strait (1838-12 Nov 1918)," Memorial #84836264, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/84836264 (accessed September 1, 2020).
